text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text:
So like, what kind of costume are you<n>going for this year?
Something easy<n>like a witch? Or something with a bit<n>more
"mreeeow," like a black cat?

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh, would you stop it and get back<n>to work already?
We're supposed to<n>be helping!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...In summary, Ritto Dormitory will<n>organize this year's
cross-dorm<n>Halloween party.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The associated procedures will be<n>overseen by me, Mihono
Bourbon. As<n>chief of the party committee, I ask<n>your
cooperation.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
And me 'n Creek are handlin' the<n>costumes! Hit us up if ya
need<n>anythin'!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
We'll leave a sign-up sheet here, so<n>please fill in your name
and costume<n>idea. The academy staff will do their<n>best to
accommodate your wishes.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Oh, also. Bourbon, this is your first<n>time plannin' an event,
yeah? Lemme<n>know if ya got questions.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
At the very least, ya won't be as<n>crazy as Inari. Miho Dorm
was in<n>charge last year and boy, did they<n>make a ruckus...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
All processes are running smoothly.<n>Mission: "Cross-Dorm
Halloween<n>Party," Objective 1: order candy—has<n>been
completed.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Likewise, permission to use the fog<n>machine from last year
has been<n>granted. I will deliver it to the technical<n>team
upon confirming its operational<n>status.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh my, Bourbon. You've already done<n>all that?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Yes, though the fog machine does not<n>appear to be
functional. I attempted to<n>turn the device on, but it is not<n>
producing f—

text_block_list.name: Fog Machine
text_block_list.text: Beep! Fssssshhh!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah?! Gwaaaack?!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Cough... Critical error detected.However, the excess water vaporshould not have any adverse effectson us. Cough.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ...We're in for a ride, huh?

And so begin the preparations for this<n>year's cross-dorm
Halloween party,<n>with Mihono Bourbon at the helm.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I've purchased the catering team's<n>order of butter. Next, I
need to procure<n>light bulbs for the technical team.<n>Then, I'll
draft the guide team's shift<n>schedules and reply to the
costume<n>team's message...
SPLAT! Crack...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Task: prepare spare<n>jack-o'-lanterns—failed. I will eat the<n>
salvageable pieces of pumpkin...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Next, event overview practice.<n>"Tracen Academy's first
Halloween<n>party started as an event for foreign<n>exchange
students. Rather than strict<n>adherence to tradition, a more
fluid<n>approach was taken to maximize<n>entertainment
value."

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Bourbon is being pulled every which<n>way with all these
tasks. It really goes<n>to show how much work a<n>
cross-dorm event takes.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I wish I could help somehow, but I<n>don't want to get in
her way and<n>overcomplicate things....

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Rice?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, s-sorry. I just... had the same<n>thought...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I don't want to make things worse,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Munch, munch...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(Are those smashed-up pumpkins the<n>ones Bourbon tried to
carve earlier?)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Total pumpkin remaining—15 kg, 600<n>g. Rehydration
necessary before<n>further consumption.

text_block_list.name: Ritto Student
text_block_list.text: Um, Bourbon? Do you want us to help<n>eat the leftovers?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No, please continue with your own<n>routines. I am the one
who failed the<n>pumpkin carving task, so I must take<n>
responsibility for the loss incurred.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Rice, you're blockin' traffic. I'm<n>gonna steal the last
carrot hamburger<n>steak if ya don't hurry.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Wah?! I'm sorry, I'm so sorry! I'm<n>not in line, so um...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
What, ya got business with Bourbon?<n>Quit bein' shy and
just ask her then.<n>C'mon.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
All righty. Hey Bourbon, we're<n>crashin' your table. Rice's
got<n>somethin' she wants to tell ya.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-no! I... I just... I only, um...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Aw, quit playin' coy—unless you'retryin' to make this harder. Justease in with some small talk, yeah?Ask her 'bout the weather.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Okay, uhm... uhhh...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-nice weather we're having, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Yes. The sky should be clear all day.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ...For real? There's bad first dates...and then there's this.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh, goodness.
Preparations for the party are goingsomewhat smoothly. For now, atleast.
Later...

text_block_list.name: Students
text_block_list.text: AAAAAH!
A shriek pierces the stillness of<n>night...
